footer.description: Shabaka Invest Group's innovation hub. We transform bold ideas into continental technology leaders.

hero.title:
Building
Africa's
Technological Future.
hero.description: Deploy cutting-edge solutions through an integrated partnership. We merge our R&D expertise with your ambitions to sustainably transform your competitive advantage.

about_section.title: The entrepreneurial hub that transforms ideas into tomorrow's leaders.
about_section.description: Shabaka InnovLab is the dedicated technological innovation subsidiary of Shabaka Invest Group. Designed to position Marrakech as a regional center of excellence, our structure acts as an unprecedented growth catalyst.
about_section.card_desc: We create a solid bridge between startups, institutional investors, and the private sector to generate shared value creation (Win-Win).

journey.title: Your Entrepreneurial Journey
journey.description: A clear, sequenced, and supported path to go from idea to global impact.
journey.step1_desc: Our Dev Studio transforms your concept into a robust and scalable MVP.
journey.step2_desc: Native integration of AI and cybersecurity for total market trust.
journey.step3_desc: Intensive 3-6 month program to dominate your Go-to-Market.
journey.step4_desc: Proactive legal and fiscal engineering to protect your growth.
journey.step5_desc: Direct access to Shabaka Invest capital and the global network.

startups.title: Accelerate your Growth
startups.description: Transform your potential into leadership. We connect your agility to our network power to multiply your market opportunities.
startups.market_access_desc: Strategic connections with key accounts and key partners.
startups.tech_support_desc: Access to our infrastructure and experts to secure your scale-up.
startups.quote: "We transform promising startups into continental champions."

why_us.approach_quote: "The success of an idea depends on the absence of resistance to its movement."
why_us.approach_desc: Our mission is simple: we manage the complexity (technical, legal, financial) so you can focus exclusively on your vision.
why_us.title:
A Community
of Builders
why_us.expertise_desc: Benefit from the lessons learned by our senior founders.
why_us.speed_desc: Go from prototype to market in record time.
why_us.network_desc: A springboard to the continent's strategic markets.

infrastructure.title: The InnovLab Space
infrastructure.description: Access to our infrastructure is designed not as a rental, but as a strategic resource made exclusively available to incubated projects to maximize their productivity.
infrastructure.coworking_desc: Open and modular workspaces, designed to encourage exchanges, skill sharing, and spontaneous collaboration between project leaders.
infrastructure.open_space_desc: Dedicated work floors for project teams in the development phase, promoting total immersion in the collective dynamic, without barriers.
infrastructure.meeting_rooms_desc: Spaces equipped with presentation technologies made available to incubatees for their strategic work sessions and investor meetings.
infrastructure.btn_visit: Schedule a visit to the space

sis.title: Shabaka Intelligence Systems (SIS)
sis.description: Shabaka InnovLab owns and pilots its own cutting-edge technological structure. Majority-owned by the incubator, SIS is a Simplified Joint Stock Company (SAS) that acts as the group's R&D engine.
sis.sovereignty_desc: Creation of AI solutions adapted to the specificities of the Moroccan and African markets.
sis.hardware_desc: Research and development of proprietary hardware and advanced software.
sis.integration_desc: Deployment of AI in key sectors (real estate, energy, health, legal).

solutions.title:
Our Corporate
Centers of Excellence
solutions.description: Robust and modular software infrastructures, ready to be deployed within your existing architectures.
solutions.ai_desc: Generative and predictive AI engines adapted to the specificities of your business sector.
solutions.cyber_desc: Zero-Trust architectures and proactive protection of African strategic data.
solutions.networks_desc: IoT ecosystems and unified APIs for total interoperability of your services.
solutions.tailored_desc: Custom development of critical software building blocks for your businesses.

external_services.title:
Your Digital Transformation
Partner
external_services.description: Beyond incubation, Shabaka InnovLab's striking force is at your disposal. Whether you are an SME or a large account, we put our ecosystem of experts at the service of your technological projects.
external_services.dev_studio_desc: Custom development of platforms (Web, Mobile, E-commerce) and software engineering for robust and scalable architectures.
external_services.ai_cyber_desc: Process automation, integration of AI solutions, and absolute protection of your strategic data.
external_services.academy_desc: Strategic support (marketing, management), and certifying training in new technologies for your teams.

portfolio_section.title: Our Sector Fortresses
portfolio_section.description: Proprietary vertical solutions designed to dominate specific markets.
portfolio_section.proptech_desc: Revolutionizing real estate management and construction.
portfolio_section.media_desc: Digital agility and strategic AI monitoring.

testimonials.title: Echoes of the Ecosystem
testimonials.description: They are building tomorrow's Africa with Shabaka InnovLab.

contact_page.title: Contact
contact_page.subtitle: Contact our team
contact_page.description: Ready to turn your vision into reality? Our team is at your disposal to discuss your projects and ambitions.
contact_page.form_desc: Fill out the form below and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
contact_page.placeholder_message: Detail your project or request here...

candidature.founder_desc: Join the ecosystem and transform your idea into a viable startup.
candidature.investor_desc: Access our qualified deal flow and participate in the rise of African innovation.
candidature.startup_desc: Benefit from our infrastructure and network to scale up.

placeholders.project_description: Describe your idea in a few sentences...
placeholders.investment_thesis: What sectors or stages do you prefer?

portfolio_page.title: OUR PORTFOLIO
portfolio_page.description: Discover the innovative projects powered by Shabaka InnovLab in various strategic sectors.
portfolio_page.no_results: No projects found for this category.
